feed.title: Voyager
feed.subtitle:
Welcome to "Voyager," the podcast where the frontiers of technology, cybersecurity, and scientific discovery converge. Each week, we embark on a digital odyssey through the vast and ever-evolving landscape of the internet to bring you the most intriguing and vital stories from the realms of tech and science.
In "Voyager," we delve deep into the latest advancements in technology, from groundbreaking gadgets and innovations to the software shaping our digital world. We unravel the complex and fascinating world of cybersecurity, keeping you informed about the latest threats, defenses, and trends that matter in our increasingly connected lives.
But our journey doesn't stop there. We also traverse the exciting universe of scientific discovery, bringing you cutting-edge news, interviews with thought leaders, and insights into the research that's changing our understanding of the world and beyond.
Whether you're a tech enthusiast, a cybersecurity professional, or just curious about the scientific phenomena shaping our future, "Voyager" is your guide through the complex web of modern innovation. Join us as we explore the most compelling stories at the intersection of technology, cybersecurity, and science – stories that inform, inspire, and ignite the imagination.
Subscribe to "Voyager" and stay ahead of the curve in this fast-paced digital age. New episodes drop every week, filled with expert analysis, engaging discussions, and a passion for the marvels of the internet era. Set sail with us on this journey of discovery and exploration – into the heart of what's next.

entry.title: Powering the Future: Axle Energy's Journey to Decarbonize the Grid
entry.summary:
In recent news, Axle Energy has secured a $9 million seed funding round led by Accel to support its mission of decarbonizing the grid. The company aims to develop innovative solutions to reduce carbon emissions and promote sustainable energy sources. In another story, actor Michael Douglas has revealed that he considers Mallorca his "second home" and plans to spend his semi-retirement there. The beautiful island has captured his heart, and he looks forward to enjoying its serene environment. Additionally, a sponsored article highlights three ways for colocation data centers to cut carbon emissions in the AI world, emphasizing the importance of sustainability in the tech industry.

In the world of technology, a groundbreaking tool called RapidPipeline has been released at SIGGRAPH 2024. This tool simplifies 3D data preparation, making it as easy as ordering a pizza. It streamlines the process and enhances efficiency, revolutionizing the way 3D data is handled. Furthermore, OpenAI has tested a long output version of GPT-4o, a language model capable of generating 64K tokens in a single instance. The model's usage comes at a cost of $6 per million tokens input and $18 per million tokens output, showcasing its potential for various applications.

Meta, formerly known as Facebook, has allocated an additional $4.5 billion towards the development of the metaverse in the second quarter. The company is preparing for the growth of artificial intelligence within this virtual realm, recognizing its significance in shaping the future of technology. In the field of quantum computing, Bloq Quantum has raised INR 1.3 crore to accelerate enterprise adoption of this cutting-edge technology. Quantum computing holds immense potential for solving complex problems and advancing various industries.

Addressing the tech landscape, C P Gurnani discusses how India has proven Sam Altman wrong. Gurnani highlights India's thriving tech ecosystem and its ability to foster innovation and entrepreneurship. Lastly, a new Python library called Darts has been introduced, offering user-friendly forecasting and anomaly detection on time series data. This library provides valuable tools for data analysis and prediction, facilitating decision-making processes.

Overall, these developments in the world and the tech industry showcase the ongoing efforts to promote sustainability, explore new frontiers in technology, and harness the power of innovation for a better future.
